description: Retrieves the prepared statement with the specified name from the specified workgroup.

parameters.name: StatementName
parameters.description: The name of the prepared statement to retrieve.

parameters.name: WorkGroup
parameters.description: The workgroup to which the statement to be retrieved belongs.

nested_items.name: PreparedStatement
nested_items.description: The name of the prepared statement that was retrieved.

nested_items.name: StatementName
nested_items.description: The name of the prepared statement.

nested_items.name: QueryStatement
nested_items.description: The query string for the prepared statement.

nested_items.name: WorkGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup to which the prepared statement belongs.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the prepared statement.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last modified time of the prepared statement.
